item.title: European Leaders Insist Ukraine Must be Part of Peace Talks
item.description: EU foreign ministers meet ahead of Friday’s Trump-Putin talks in Alaska, with Brussels insisting any peace deal must include Ukraine. And Al Jazeera’s...

item.title: Ford says it will roll out a cheaper electric pickup truck

item.title: Trump says he will 'feel out' Putin in Alaska on ending the war in Ukraine
item.description: President Trump says he thinks Russian President Vladimir Putin is ready to end his war on Ukraine, but he will use a Friday summit to "feel out" his ...

item.title: Trump says Nvidia will hand the U.S. 15% of its H20 chip sales to China
item.description: The president said that Nvidia would pay the government in exchange for easing export restrictions — and that he'd initially asked for a larger cut.
